member.name: D3D12_AXIS_SHADING_RATE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify the shading rate (for variable-rate shading, or VRS) along a horizontal or vertical axis. For more info, see Variable-rate shading (VRS).

member.name: D3D12_AXIS_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_AXIS_SHADING_RATE_1X
member.summary: Specifies a 1x shading rate for the axis.

member.name: D3D12_AXIS_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_AXIS_SHADING_RATE_2X
member.summary: Specifies a 2x shading rate for the axis.

member.name: D3D12_AXIS_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_AXIS_SHADING_RATE_4X
member.summary: Specifies a 4x shading rate for the axis.
